bienvenue.lettre2:
You will discover the exciting world of Super Mario in a virtual escape game.
Do not hesitate to contact Toad! The chatbot available, top right, if you need help.

sondage.sous-titre: Preliminary study for the integration of a chatbot as a clue dispenser in an Escape Game
sondage.txt:
You are invited to participate in a survey as part of this thesis for the University of Namur.
Could you answer the survey questions after participating in the game?

game.youwintxt: Congratulations, you won with a score of
game.barque2: Don't leave Luigi alone with Toad(the mushroom), Luigi will eat it!
game.barque3: Don't leave Luigi alone with Bowser, Bowser will eat him!
